select mrch_id, mrch_id as validate_id, account, description, type, locked, state, is_deleted, version_num, (select version_name from weiit_init_version where version_num=m.version_num) as version_name, version_begin_time, version_expire_time, parent_id from weiit_merchant m where locked=0 and is_deleted=0 and account=#{account}

select * from ( select temp.service_num, max(temp.expire_time) as expire_time from ( select service_num, m.version_expire_time as expire_time from weiit_init_version_service s inner join (select version_num, version_expire_time from weiit_merchant where mrch_id = #{mrch_id} ) m on s.version_num = m.version_num union all select service_num, expire_time from weiit_merchant_service where mrch_id = #{mrch_id} ) temp group by temp.service_num ) t where t.expire_time > now()

select mrch_id, mrch_id as validate_id, account, description, type, locked, state, is_deleted, version_num, (select version_name from weiit_init_version where version_num = m.version_num) as version_name, version_begin_time, version_expire_time, parent_id from weiit_merchant m where locked = 0 and is_deleted = 0 and mrch_id = #{mrch_id}
mapper.update: update weiit_merchant set password=#{password}, update_time=now() where mrch_id = #{validate_id}
